content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun, easy to understand

Nice little challenge. 
The introduction is quite hard to get in though. I would tell first (before the cake being cut) that l is the length, alond x-axis, and b the breadth, along y-axis.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I accept this contribution because it is an original and fun challenge. It is not hard, however the shortest mode will give the players some subtleties to find. I found it fun to code, so I accept it!

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Fun little challenge!
The length of the cake is along the x-axis, and the breadth is along the y axis. Please clarify this.

Input sections :
* Please add the l and b variable for Line 1
* Please format the variables with <<var>> like you did in other sections

Goal section
* Please specify that the cake is rectangular.
* Please write [[x]]-coordinate instead of abscissa [[x]] because some may not know the word abscissa.
* Please write [[y]]-coordinate instead of ordinate [[y]].

Input and Output sections
* For line 2, please use the terms as mentioned above.
* Please present these section following the example in the contribution guidelines, i.e. format the line numbers in bold, specify the variable names and variable types.
https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/statement#guidelines

Constraints section
* Please format the variables e.g. [[l]].

Cases
* I suggest to swap validator 3 and validator 4 because Validator 3 and Test 3 are both edge cases which should be paired together.
* Similarly, I suggest to swap validator 2 and validator 5.

Thanks.
